AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_9_Payout1_1: At every spin, any combinations of 5 or more symbols touching horizontally or vertically will result in a winning combination.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_10_Payout1_2: If there is one or more winning combination on the reels, all symbol (excluding Wild symbol and Scatter symbol) that is not involved in a win will be removed, allowing the symbols above them to cascade down for a new round.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_11_Payout1_3: At every round, additional or increased winning combination will trigger more rounds until no more additional and increased winning combination.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_12_Payout1_4: When there is no more additional or increased winning combination, payout is made for each symbol according to the Paytable.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_14_Payout1_5: After the payout is made, all winning symbol will be removed, allowing the symbols above them to cascade down for a new round.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule1_15_Payout1_6: Additional winning combination will be tallied in every round until no more winning combination can be tallied.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule2_1_Payout2_1: At the start of any main game spin when the non-winning symbols are first removed, the win multiplier is x1.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule2_2_Payout2_2: During the subsequent removal of non-winning symbols, the win multiplier will be increased by 1.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule3_1_Payout3_1: During any spin, some symbols (excluding Wild symbol and Scatter symbol) may appear in gold.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule3_2_Payout3_2: During the removal of winning symbols, any gold symbol(s) that is involved in a win in the previous round will be transformed into Wild symbol(s).
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule4_1_Payout4_1: 3 Scatter symbols appearing anywhere will trigger the Free Spins Feature with 10 free spins. Each additional Scatter symbol will trigger 2 more free spins.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule4_2_Payout4_2: At the start of the Free Spins Feature, the win multiplier is x1.
AlchemyGoldPayoutAndRulesShared.Rule4_3_Payout4_3: During the removal of non-winning symbols, the win multiplier will be increased by 1.

AlchemyGoldRule.Rule1_1: Alchemy Gold is a 5 by 5 symbols combination video slot featuring sticky winning symbols and increasing multiplier.
AlchemyGoldRule.Rule1_2: The game is played with 10 base bet (fixed), bet level of 1 to 10 and bet size of %{minChip} to %{maxChip}.
AlchemyGoldRule.Rule1_13: A combination win in cash is equal to the value shown in the “Paytable” multiplied by bet size and bet level.
AlchemyGoldRule.Rule1_17: Free Spins Feature is played at the same bet size and bet level as the spin that triggered the Free Spins Feature.
